snippet.title: Shroom Valley Reveal Trailer - Nintendo Fan Games Direct
snippet.description:
Shroom Valley is a new Super Mario 64 DS Rom Hack created by me that I revealed at the 2021 Nintendo Fan Games Direct, linked here: https://youtu.be/PfKRN1Ejbho
This hack will contain around 40 stars in all, but it will have a well fleshed out story to make up for the otherwise shorter runtime.

Also as a side note I misspelled the name of the resistance group it's supposed to be The Hyphae's lol, guess that's what happens when you make your trailer right at the submission date and don't have time to rerecord footage smh
I will be posting further updates to this hack on the SM64DS Hacking Server, linked here: http://discord.gg/PhpA9Wt
